LeekScript Expressions.lks
  LSIfStatementImpl(IF_STATEMENT)
    PsiElement(if)('if')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    PsiElement(()('(')
    LSSingleExpressionImpl(SINGLE_EXPRESSION)
      LSLogicOrExpressionImpl(LOGIC_OR_EXPRESSION)
        LSCompareExpressionImpl(COMPARE_EXPRESSION)
          LSPrefixExpressionImpl(PREFIX_EXPRESSION)
            LSPrimaryExpressionImpl(PRIMARY_EXPRESSION)
              LSLiteralImpl(LITERAL)
                PsiElement(true)('true')
          PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
          PsiElement(==)('==')
          PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
          LSPrefixExpressionImpl(PREFIX_EXPRESSION)
            LSPrimaryExpressionImpl(PRIMARY_EXPRESSION)
              LSLiteralImpl(LITERAL)
                PsiElement(number)('1')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        PsiElement(||)('||')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        LSCompareExpressionImpl(COMPARE_EXPRESSION)
          LSPrefixExpressionImpl(PREFIX_EXPRESSION)
            LSPrimaryExpressionImpl(PRIMARY_EXPRESSION)
              LSLiteralImpl(LITERAL)
                PsiElement(false)('false')
          PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
          PsiElement(==)('==')
          PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
          LSPrefixExpressionImpl(PREFIX_EXPRESSION)
            LSPrimaryExpressionImpl(PRIMARY_EXPRESSION)
              LSLiteralImpl(LITERAL)
                PsiElement(number)('2')
    PsiElement())(')')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    LSThenBlockImpl(THEN_BLOCK)
      LSBlockImpl(BLOCK)
        PsiElement({)('{')
        PsiWhiteSpace('\n\n')
        PsiElement(})('}')
